metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3907 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: OctoRPKI does not escape a URI with a filename containing "..", this allows a repository to create a file, (ex. rsync://example.org/repo/../../etc/cron.daily/evil.roa), which would then be written to disk outside the base cache folder. This could allow for remote code execution on the host machine OctoRPKI is running on.

criterions.comment: cfrpki package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
